roleset.name: shape
roleset.note: MOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mold' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from mold.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: end state, if different from arg1

example.name: the one example
example.text: [CNN's viewer habits]-1 have been molded [*-1]by its format.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: Its amazing to think this watery goop can be molded into the shape of a jug, dried, and used for milienia to come.
example.arg: into the shape of a jug, dried,
